name: Lentil and Bulgur Salad
author: Anonymous
summary: Though this is a salad, it is substantial enough to be a main dish. It keeps refrigerated for a few days.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste
⅛ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine 4 cups boiling water and bouillon cube in a saucepan until dissolved; add lentils and cook over medium heat until lentils are tender, about 30 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat and let stand for 10 minutes
Put bulgur in a heat-proof bowl; pour in 2 cups boiling water
Let mixture stand until bulgur has absorbed most of the water and is tender, about 10 minutes
Combine lentils, bulgur, onion, and parsley in a large bowl
Mix chicken broth, red wine vinegar, cider vinegar, mustard, olive oil, garlic, oregano, Worcestershire sauce, basil, cumin, salt, hot sauce, and black pepper in a jar
Cover jar with tight-fitting lid and shake until dressing is well-mixed
Pour dressing over lentil mixture and mix well; top with scallions
